website_summaries.verdict: This can-shaped bag is a front-seat favorite, fitting between the dash and console in vans and other flat-floored vehicles.
pros: Designed to give you full garbage capacity, without taking up all your legroom
Measures 6 inches in diameter x 8 inches tall
Elastic loop for attaching to straps or belts
cons: Tips relatively easily in a back row if not strapped in

customer_reviews.title: Great size and good construction
customer_reviews.text: This fits snugly in the bottom/large compartment of the center console of my 2017 Ford Fusion Sport. The construction is solid, and the material feels rugged and like it could take a beating. If you're looking for a garbage can about 25% bigger than your average tin coffee can - this is a great choice. Check out the two attached images to get a sense of the scale, and how it can fit completely within larger consoles.
customer_reviews.author: Brad Groux

customer_reviews.title: This is a great little trash can for your car
customer_reviews.text: This is a great little trash can for your car. It provides me greatly for all those extra gum wrappers and random trash i find myself with when driving. The only part I didn't like was the sticky velcro to anchor it. It didn't work well in my brand new car. It didn't stick to the plastic floor mats or the fabric they use to line the console. I don't care so much about that, because it's a great trash bin and the perfect size.
customer_reviews.author: Krystin E.

customer_reviews.title: Mom must have !
customer_reviews.text: I love this trash bin! As a mom of 2 I collect a lot of garbage in the car through out the day. This garbage bin is the perfect size for my car and is nice and sturdy. I love that it's spill proof! Thinking about buying another one for my back seat!
customer_reviews.author: Jaym21892

customer_reviews.title: Convenient and Sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Even thought I just received the item, it's easy for me to write a positive review. I had the same item for years in another vehicle until it was accidentally ruined in a way that had nothing to do with the construction of the item. It's sturdy and convenient. I loop the elastic strap around the seat belt anchor, and it sits just behind the center console, easily reachable by the driver and front and back seat passengers. Its wide mouth eliminates the need to pry it open, which can be aggravating, especially for the driver. I highly recommend it for vehicles and vans with center consoles.
customer_reviews.author: seb3

customer_reviews.title: Nice little trash bag!
customer_reviews.text: I always have a problem keeping my car clean, receipts and other little pieces of trash seem to litter my car floor and it becomes insanely dirty. So I decided I needed to have a trash can that can be attached to my car without taking valuable leg space! In comes this little beauty! Yes it's small but it's perfect for all those little pieces of trash can I could easily fit a few cans in there as well!
customer_reviews.author: Kat

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't work like we thought.
customer_reviews.text: I gave this to my son for Christmas, since he was planning on purchasing a new car he didn't start to use it until last week. His headrests do not come off and the stretch strap will not stretch large enough to go over the entire head rest. We feel that sticking it to the floor with the Velcro will be inconvenient, as it will take up leg room and have to be unstuck from the Velcro each time he empties it, which will wear the Velcro down. So we are selling it at a yard sale.
customer_reviews.author: Lee and Dee

customer_reviews.title: Good for the price.
customer_reviews.text: The good- easy to use & can hook on to many places, compact enough yet big enough for trash from two boys. Can be improved- not waterproof at all! It has outer layer plus inside one that can be pulled out (does not detach) liquid would sleep through both. Two of the elastic loops would of been better, more stable to stay in place. Over all we still like it and might use Velcro dots to secure it better.
customer_reviews.author: Thuan Du

customer_reviews.title: Tiny
customer_reviews.text: This thing is way smaller than expected. For $9 I don't think it's worth the money. Well made but it's like 10" tall. Not worth the trip to UPS to return it otherwise I'd send it back.
customer_reviews.author: Sheree

customer_reviews.title: Good Quality
customer_reviews.text: I ordered 3 of these trash cans, one for each row of my SUV. So far, so good! The strap you use to attach the trash can is an elastic loop with no snap. So, the only way to attach it is to hang it over things (i.e., over phone charger, gear shift, seat arm, removing headrest and hanging it off the back of the seat). The only improvement would be to add a snap to make it a bit easier to attach/hang.
customer_reviews.author: D J Carpenter

customer_reviews.title: Great--just one suggestion to make it perfect!
customer_reviews.text: This product so far is nice---the only thing it is missing (that I somehow thought it would have) is some sort of way to close it (perhaps a drawstring top? Just so yucky things don't fall out (since I am not securing this anywhere in my car....I have nowhere to secure it to)
customer_reviews.author: amanda

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Collapsible Pop-up leak proof trash can, well recommend
customer_reviews.text: I love this little trash can, perfect size, not wimpy either. Springs right open and stays strong, bought two for myself. One for Suburban, one for Work area. I keep in backpack, when empty, I fold or it collapses flat and takes up no room. Pull it out and open it up , throw your trash in it. Plastic coke bottles, crumbled up paper etc. if some nut case throws a drink cup in there, hit them, then clean up simple mess, the trash can is leak proof!
customer_reviews.author: Andre

customer_reviews.title: Clean up on aisle two
customer_reviews.text: I love these darn things. My last one disappeared somehow. They’re cheap as hell, small and they just work. You can’t kill one, if something does happen to it you won’t be upset. Just grab another one. The small size is actually one of the selling points for me. It’ll hold a few bits of trash and a couple of empty soda cans, and that’s it. Forces me to empty it so frequently it doesn’t have time to get nasty. I’ve bought a dozen different auto trash bags and I keep coming back to this guy. Maybe I’ll learn this time. lol. I love it. Thanks for reading
customer_reviews.author: MooseTop Contributor: Camping

customer_reviews.title: Nice product
customer_reviews.text: I have been looking for nice and durable car trash cans and what I found was just the typical ones that if you step in them then they are gone. I have a 3 year old and he is rough with stuff, and so far he has stepped on it and is still there, and I love the fact that it has a double bag so it's more durable.
customer_reviews.author: Liliana Valdes-Howard

customer_reviews.title: This is the second car trash can i have purchased. Works better than anything I have tried.
customer_reviews.text: This is my second one to buy. I bought one for our first car, and now bought one for the second car. We hang them on a hook behind the passenger seat. It is easy to remove and empty. If it gets dirty, it is very washable. I just run water in it and air dry it. It keeps out cars much cleaner, because otherwise I throw trash on the floor!
customer_reviews.author: Anita Howard

customer_reviews.title: DOESN'T TAKE UP MUCH SPACE, HELPS KEEP INTERIOR TIDY, BUT WILL NEEED TO BE EMPTIED FAIRLY OFTEN
customer_reviews.text: Very convenient little trash cans. Don't expect them to hold a huge amount of trash or large drink bottles. They will hold plenty of little pieces of trash or one, maybe two, 20 oz soda bottles... or 2-3 cans. I like the size because they don't take up a lot of room, but they will need to be emptied fairly often. However, if you live in your car and/or hoard garbage in it- this is not a good product for you!
customer_reviews.author: Tactical geek

customer_reviews.title: Cute lil trash can
customer_reviews.text: This is the perfect size to collect a few days’ worth of garbage from my minivan. I wish the elastic loop had Velcro to open and close it so I wouldn’t have to remove the head rest to install it but otherwise it’s a nice design. It also includes Velcro for the bottom so it can be attached anywhere you’d like.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel

customer_reviews.title: Love this little trash can
customer_reviews.text: I am very pleased with this little trash can. I have secured it on my passenger seat's headrest peg facing the back seat. For me, this has been a perfect spot for it as I can easily reach back and put in the trash. I have more limited leg room in the front. It has a good capacity and can fold up really easily. I have not yet tested the leak proof-ness of it, but I do think it would be fine with small liquids. I would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Alicia D. Devoll

customer_reviews.title: Good size and quality
customer_reviews.text: Have it hooked over my gear shift and hanging down by the passengers seat. The stretchy strap works perfectly. Small enough that it's not obnoxious, but big enough that you don't have to empty it all the time. Does the job. Good quality.
customer_reviews.author: Kylie

customer_reviews.title: Works well. Needs better way to keep it from tipping.
customer_reviews.text: It's a nice little trash can. It's small but you can put a lot of stuff in it. I don't like it hanging off my seat so I stuck it in between the rear bucket seats. It came with some velcro to stick to the carpet. My only dislike is that the velcro to hold it in place is pretty much useless. It will stick to the carpet but not very well. I wish it had a weighted bottom to keep it from falling over.
customer_reviews.author: Addled

customer_reviews.title: Love that it remains open at the top so the ...
customer_reviews.text: It works well in our Nissan Murano. Love that it remains open at the top so the trash actually goes where it's supposed to go! I finally found a place to hang it so it stays where it's supposed to stay! Best we've ever had.
customer_reviews.author: Frank Perry

customer_reviews.title: It's the perfect size - Not to big
customer_reviews.text: There is a little velcro square on the bottom so you can attach it somewhere, but also the elastic loop so you can hang it off of the gearshift. It's the perfect size - Not to big, not too small. I usually use grocery bag hanging from the gear shift, but i have to open it to put the trash in - With this, I can just throw it in there.
customer_reviews.author: Christie

customer_reviews.title: Very nice item.
customer_reviews.text: This was a very good buy it helps with most of the trash accumulated in my car. Its definitely not as big as I hoped but that's okay because I have 3 kids. I own a Kia soul and room wise everyone sits just fine. It goes in the middle I attached it to my middle console and it holds up great. I added a bag to it just so I can take the trash bag out and refill another bag. Very happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: amanda

customer_reviews.title: A great asset for my car!!!
customer_reviews.text: I bought two of these several years ago and loved them. I gave one to my husband and one for myself. While visiting Winnipeg, my son-in-law made a positive comment about my trash bin when he used my car, something to the effect that he liked it and thought that he would like one. So I am just now ordering 3 of them as gifts for family members.
customer_reviews.author: Winnipeg, Canada

customer_reviews.title: Good car trash can,  needs an adjustable strap!
customer_reviews.text: The trash can itself is perfect and collapses to stow away nicely (very much like a mini laundry basket). The only reason that this is not 5 stars is the elastic leash isn't quite long enough. It would be better just a little longer, or with an adjustable strap. Still, a good car trash can for the money!
customer_reviews.author: Brian East

customer_reviews.title: Plain Black...no writing on it.  Great size!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect size..Car is not printed on the side. It is plain black, compresses to a size you can store in your glove box until needed. Perfect size to tuck into the foot area of the front seat without impeding your feet. If you have a gear shift it can be hung by that. Frankly, I will just be using it standing on its own. It does have a velcro bottom sticky pad, but, I'm not sure it will even be necessary.
customer_reviews.author: SunnyK

customer_reviews.title: AVOID!  Too small to be useful, elastic strap will not keep the compression in place.
customer_reviews.text: Would avoid this tiny and poorly executed design of a trash can. This is really too small to be useful for anything more than a soda can and a small snack wrapper. The overall construction appears OK but the spring that pops up the can is very firm and the the elastic strap that is designed to keep then can compressed is impossible to keep in place, causing the can to flip to the open/expanded position when stored. Regret buying this, and annoyed to see that it was not returnable. Avoid this and look for something larger w/ a more secure strap.
customer_reviews.author: BiMo

customer_reviews.title: JUNK, JUNK, JUNK!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I could not believe what I saw when I open the package. This thing is a joke - it truly is. I can't believe Amazon allows them to not allow returns. It is so small that it will hold a soda can and not much more! Absolute disgrace!!! Terrible product - terrible seller!!!
customer_reviews.author: DLM

customer_reviews.title: No more excuses!
customer_reviews.text: Just what I needed. I have it handing in the back of the front passenger seat. Easy reach from the driver's seat. Convenient for disposing receipts, straw starlets, bits and pieces. No more excuses for junk on my seatss and floors! Well made with a liner, easy to take out of vehicle and empty.
customer_reviews.author: Sharon S.

customer_reviews.title: Very handy and easy to lcean.
customer_reviews.text: This is the second one I have purchased, two cars, I especially like the washability of the item. I just hook it over shift lever on the floor and it hangs behind my right leg ao it is easily accessible for driver and passenger. People in the back seat, very seldom, just roll down the window and let the trash fly. I'm kidding I would easily buy a third one if it were needed.
customer_reviews.author: Charles Parker

customer_reviews.title: Poorly made.  Wire poking out the bottom and hard to remove from headrest
customer_reviews.text: Super frustrating. I have had this about a year. The main problem is that the strap is a continuous loop rather than having a Velcro or snap closure. This means that to hang it on the back of the seat, you have to take it on and off the head rest every time you empty it (which is frequently because it is small). I tried cutting the strap and putting Velcro on it but the Velcro fell off. Then the wire poked through the bottom of the bag. Poorly made. I give up.
customer_reviews.author: JBF

customer_reviews.title: I love my trash can!
customer_reviews.text: This is the best car trash can I've used so far. I used one of those little 3M Command hooks on my dash and hung the trash can by it's loop. I used to have a bag hanging there, but I was always struggling to find the opening to put the trash in, and that's distracting while driving. This won't do for people who want to put more than three empty coffee cups in at a time, because it isn't huge, but it's great for the little things like straw wrappers, receipts, used napkins, etc, (plus three medium coffee cups). I bought another for the back seat and just bought one for my son who just purchased his first car.
customer_reviews.author: T. Charles

customer_reviews.title: These are great trash cans
customer_reviews.text: These are great trash cans. Small and sturdy but not too small! Small loop keeps it attached to hook on my console . Also, the loop can be attached to the back of the headrest. I attached one there so that my daughter will see it and hopefully remember to clean up after herself! There is also velcro tape on the bottom if you need it to help it stand up. I am not currently using it like that because the loop attached is perfect for my needs. *update*aug2018 The wires in the cans has popped through the fabric and is so sharp on one of them that I had to pull it the rest of the way out.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa

customer_reviews.title: It's ok. Not good quality.
customer_reviews.text: I want to like it. It is small, but that works for me. I'd rather keep my car tidy, empty it often rather than have a huge trash in my car. Plus it doesn't take up much room. The issue is the quality. It broke with 5 minutes of opening the package. The elastic popped off on one side. I tied it so that it still works. The seams look like they are ready to unravel with a bit of use. It isn't worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I am not a fan of this
customer_reviews.text: This is really a waste of money. I read the description and expected it to be small but I figured it was large enough to hold more than straw wrappers and random bits of paper. This might be ok if you don't have kids but save your money if you have kids because one quick trip through the drive thru and it's beyond filled!
customer_reviews.author: KLuv

customer_reviews.title: Great size, leak proof
customer_reviews.text: This is a great little size for my car floor. I do wish the top loop were longer because I don't have an easy spot to put it. Definitely leak proof and easy to clean as my child recently got sick on the way home and it didn't leak and cleaned out with just the sink sprayer.
customer_reviews.author: Western MA Mom

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: This little trash can is fantastic for use in your car. Velcro allows attachment any where you like. It's lined so it won't leak. Easy to remove to empty. If you have a large van or kids I'd use two. I would buy it again and recommend highly.
customer_reviews.author: Burke

customer_reviews.title: Great for squad car.
customer_reviews.text: Love it for my squad car and use a extra large carinbinger to hang it but only problem is that it doesn’t collapse down very easily. When I’m not using it, it would be nice if it came with a pouch to put into my duty bag instead of scrunch it down and hope it doesn’t pop out of my bag.
customer_reviews.author: Mack Dihle

customer_reviews.title: Okay, loop needs to be longer/bigger
customer_reviews.text: Very cute and well made but the loop won't fit over the head rest for my car seat. Will have to figure out a workaround for that. I was hoping my husband would use this rather than toss trash behind his head. Wish someone made a magnetic sign stating, "A car is not a trash can."
customer_reviews.author: T.C.

customer_reviews.title: It was nice quality but small
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a Trash can for our car because as a mom, our kids always have trash from snack that I fight to find a place to store. It was nice quality but small! I wish there was two sizes. This size would be good for a small car but I wish it was slightly larger for my SUV. Please take this into consideration.
customer_reviews.author: Erin Gill

customer_reviews.title: A little small but then how much trash are you ...
customer_reviews.text: A little small but then how much trash are you going to keep hauling in between dumps. Yes, I"ve noticed the smell of rotten milk from that shake I had last week that I didn't know was in that supermarket plastic bag. But there was no place to hang one in the new vehicle, NOW there is.
customer_reviews.author: Emily

customer_reviews.title: Leak-resistant, spot wash, keeps shape
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for fathers day. Problem is that the strap isn't adjustable, and is very short. We fixed it with Velcro, tacking it down so it wouldn't move.. But its sort of a design flaw that should be addressed. Not bad for the price I guess. It is leak proof and can be spot washed easily so that's good.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth

customer_reviews.title: SO useful, my car is always clean now!
customer_reviews.text: I love this! It makes keeping my car clean SO much easier because I have a designated place to put trash and I can dump it all in one go without scrambling for a million straw wrappers. It's small, collapsible, and blends in much better than a plastic can would. You may need more than one if you travel with others, but as a solo commuter one works for me. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Trash Can
customer_reviews.text: Love this item, it stands perfectly on the floor of the passenger side, I didn't want to hang it, so this option is perfect
customer_reviews.author: PA GAL ALWAYS

customer_reviews.title: Prefer other design
customer_reviews.text: I had purchased one of these years ago and the lining of the can wore out, so I bought a new one. Old can had velcro straps to attach to the car, with the new closed loop strap there is no way to attach this to headrests, etc. We are using a carabiner to improvise, but the velcro made it so much easier to remove and dump the garbage.
customer_reviews.author: jg

customer_reviews.title: Durable car trash can
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for a family member. They were so happy to receive it that they hugged me-something they normally don't do. They love the fact it is washable and can hold drinks as well as garbage. Wish it came in colors, but very satisfied that they were satisfied!
customer_reviews.author: allison_m_funkonovo

customer_reviews.title: I've needed this for 20 years
customer_reviews.text: How did I manage without this garbage? My garbage was in the passenger foot area, or behind the seats. No More! This garbage loops around my shifter and allows me to keep a cleaner car. My car now has a trifecta of cleanliness with this garbage can, a good vacuum that connects to 12v, and wipes to keep the glass and dash clean.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher J. Larson

customer_reviews.title: A Waste!
customer_reviews.text: Almost fits the need but wish it had a velcro application for the side. The velcro applied to the bottom allows it to move with the floor mat and the bag needs to nestle against the side of the center foot area. **Update: this tips over, constantly! Just tossed the thing:-(
customer_reviews.author: K. Kurtz

customer_reviews.title: Bit small but works great!
customer_reviews.text: I guess I didn't read the product description well enough because I thought it was going to be bigger. It is leakproof so far and I use it to hold my water bottles and pre-workout so that it doesn't go flying if I have to stop hard (which happens when you live on a dirt road). It doesn't leak the sweat from my cold bottles and collapses easily enough so it really is portable. Love it, just wish there was a bit of a bigger size.
customer_reviews.author: Holly

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for people who tend to collect fast food receipts
customer_reviews.text: This thing is a lifesaver of you're a messy person and need to keep old receipts and crushed soda cans that would otherwise end up on the floor of your car. No more mess. No more straw wrappers on the seats. Easy clean up! I dump this thing in the trash can at the gamestop my bf worked at. Super convenient.
customer_reviews.author: valerie Garza

customer_reviews.title: Cleans up nicely if you have to
customer_reviews.text: More handy than I thought actually. Cleans up nicely if you have to. For the price I had perry low expectations, I really don't mind saying that the product is better than anticipated.
customer_reviews.author: LeeAnn Walker

customer_reviews.title: I was pretty disappointed with this
customer_reviews.text: I was pretty disappointed with this. The can itself works great, but I had the same issue as some others that the strap isn't attached well. I opened mine, gave it a test tug to see how it would work and it came undone. The rest of the materials seems well made and put together, but it is kind of pointless for me if I can't hang it in my car.
customer_reviews.author: Daren Hill

customer_reviews.title: No more trash all over my car floor.
customer_reviews.text: I have a child who thinks my backseat is his own personal trash can... this collapsible can has saved us from many arguments. I clip a small plastic bag on the inside to protect it from sticky things, and I empty it every time I put gas in my car. It easily hangs from the front headrest so it's accessible - no more trash all over the back of my car.
customer_reviews.author: vsnizzle

customer_reviews.title: Works great - holds a lot
customer_reviews.text: Ever since I saw this portable trash can in my daughter's car, I had been looking for one (so I could get rid of the old empty Kleenex box I was using). :-) This works great & holds a ton. Now my husband wants one for his car too.
customer_reviews.author: Justa Girl

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for my car
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for my car. Only gave it 4 stars bc the velcro came off after 2 days. So i went to the storeand got heavy duty velcro. Works great after that! Sits on the center cupholder thing between my kids seats
customer_reviews.author: Stephven

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Great trash can for the vehicle but just look at the size, I love these trash cans but should have ordered a bigger one, but can’t go wrong they don’t leak, which is great
customer_reviews.author: Tydette Tisdell

customer_reviews.title: not worth it in my opinion.
customer_reviews.text: Personally, I find the portable trash can to be way too small and hard to keep down in my car when its empty. I tried tying it down with the strap around my gear shift, and the elastic band isn't long enough. I'd be afraid to put too much trash in this thing for fear of it spilling over. I honestly wish I had not bought it.
customer_reviews.author: truthfortoday14

customer_reviews.title: Great vehicle trash container
customer_reviews.text: I love this thing! I've had one in my car for 10 years, and it finally needed replacement. This is a great, well-made trash container. I slide the elastic holder over my gear shift, so it doesn't fall over. Works great!
customer_reviews.author: Nadine

customer_reviews.title: Great for the Yukon
customer_reviews.text: I have two - one for trash and one for recycling. Use grocery bags as liners - haven't had to worry about whether it's actually leak-proof. Works great and looks like it will last a long time. THANKS
customer_reviews.author: FACE

customer_reviews.title: Good car trash can.
customer_reviews.text: Great trash can for a car. My only criticism is that when collapsed it does not have a built in strap to wrap it up.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew R. Stastny

customer_reviews.title: Great so far!
customer_reviews.text: Just received it so I haven't put it to the test yet, but I like it so far! It is the perfect size for the car and fits nicely in the back seat. It is just what I was looking for!
customer_reviews.author: Vikki M.

customer_reviews.title: Very handy
customer_reviews.text: I think it could be just a little bigger but other than that I love it! I love being able to wash and sanitize it with ease and re-use also great if a kiddo gets sick, you know with this trash can it's not going to leak through.
customer_reviews.author: CM4

customer_reviews.title: Very small
customer_reviews.text: Very small. I think a coffee can is bigger than this. Waste of money. I bought a different type the same day this was delivered and I took it out of the package. Would not buy again
customer_reviews.author: Ricky

customer_reviews.title: I threw it away.
customer_reviews.text: Very small, barely holds a soda can.... i bought a rubbermaid trashcan that hangs from behind the seat instead
customer_reviews.author: Jon Wayne

customer_reviews.title: Nice little trash bin
customer_reviews.text: This is great, and has kept the mess in my truck at a minimum which is nice. Plus, it's convenient, when not in use I close it and stick in right in my door for easy storage and access.
customer_reviews.author: Phoenix

customer_reviews.title: Great for keeping your car clean
customer_reviews.text: Quite convenient. Does it’s job well and keeps my car clean. A bit small, cannot fit many water bottles but it forces me to empty it. A great purchase
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great car waste basket
customer_reviews.text: Great car waste basket, and the extra lining makes keeping it clean so easy! Also, just the right size---works well and takes up very little room. Very handy, as it has a loop to put over the shift knob.
customer_reviews.author: Coffeechick

customer_reviews.title: The size and flexibility are perfect!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased a new, high-end vehicle. I did not want a trash receptacle that was obvious. The flexibility allowed me to put it in my console. Great purchase.
customer_reviews.author: JayHawk Fan

customer_reviews.title: Functional, petite, good looking
customer_reviews.text: Really like this petite car garbage can for my small 2017 Civic. A space to stick trash w/o overwhelming the car’s small interior.
customer_reviews.author: Laura

customer_reviews.title: Great little trash can for vehicle.
customer_reviews.text: This is a great little trash can and it can be collapsed and stored when not in use. Very good price.
customer_reviews.author: Fonda Hellen

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for a cousin who needed somewhere to put the garbage in her car! Compact, easy to clean if dirtied and perfect size for in the car.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: I am very happy with it
customer_reviews.text: I just bought a VERY small car and was searching for something I could use for trash. Your product turned to be just what I was looking for! It's out of the way and doesn't need to be emptied as often as other containers. I am very happy with it!
customer_reviews.author: anncee

customer_reviews.title: Lightweight
customer_reviews.text: Nice to have in the car though it does roll around a lot as it is very lightweight. I make sure the open faces away from the window as things will blow out. I have it on a hook from the headrest.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for a car. Not too big, easy to hang from an arm rest, and keeps leaks at bay.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Manning

customer_reviews.title: This is really too small for my car
customer_reviews.text: I couldn't keep it "tied down". It kept rolling around, spilling the contents everywhere!
customer_reviews.author: ZolPam

customer_reviews.title: Simple Convenience
customer_reviews.text: Its a neat little trash container, it folds down into a circle, then can expand back out for use. Nothing special just handy to have for a few throw away items. If that is something you need then its worth it; however, they show it attached to the headrest. Unless your headrest comes off you will not be able to attach it there unless you use a d-clip or something like that.
customer_reviews.author: Anonymous

customer_reviews.title: This is the most useful purchase I've made for my car in a long ...
customer_reviews.text: This is the most useful purchase I've made for my car in a long time. Great for people who drive for a living and/or roadtrips to keep the car clean and crumb free! Love that it is washable!
customer_reviews.author: lilicedt

customer_reviews.title: Nice and Compact
customer_reviews.text: My husband's car looks like a dumpster. Just getting this little trash can has been life changing. He actually uses it and will dump it out instead of continuing to throw trash on the floor of his car. I am now getting one for my car, so my daughter will use it and not throw things on the floor.
customer_reviews.author: Melanie L Wilson

customer_reviews.title: ... that hank on the headreast brackets and it worked wonderfully. It was right at hand when I needed ...
customer_reviews.text: I got this along with some hooks that hank on the headreast brackets and it worked wonderfully. It was right at hand when I needed it while driving. When not using it folds down into a flat little package and stores anywhere you want it to. I love it.
customer_reviews.author: Cynthia L. Ciemny

customer_reviews.title: Useful!
customer_reviews.text: Took me forever to purchase this item but I finally have it! I cover it with plastic bags so that it's easy to take out the trash. Great way to organize my trash since half of the time, I am living in my car lol. Very useful item. Haven't had any problems in regards to leakage, rips, tears, or leftover smell of trash (but that's what febreeze is for!)
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I bought a second one, I like it that much
customer_reviews.text: I had the first one for years, it's in great shape, and decided to get a second one because I find the first one so useful. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Tgz

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: My wife is a litter bug, but only inside my car. She uses eyeglass wipes and I find the wrappers or wipes stuffed in the door handle or on the floor of my car along with receipts, notes and other miscellaneous papers. This trash can was a dream come true. It's small and unobtrusive but right there on a convenient place. Now my car stay just a bit neater!
customer_reviews.author: Scaren

customer_reviews.title: Just NO.
customer_reviews.text: This is the stupidest car trash can ever. It has no lid, so it's always flipping over and spilling it's contents on the floor. It has an elastic loop, not velcro so you can't easily attach it to anything but the gear shift, where it takes up space in the passenger side. So the passenger gets crowded by the thing and has the pleasure of staring into your trash while they ride with you. Simply charming.
customer_reviews.author: R. Young

customer_reviews.title: Great little car trash can
customer_reviews.text: Great little car trash can. Wish there was a strap on it that wasn't a loop so you could tie it to something if needed. I had to cut the strap to tie it to a handle. Otherwise excellent for corralling wrappers and inevitable garbage made in the car.
customer_reviews.author: Ohhthepossibilities

customer_reviews.title: This is excellent!!
customer_reviews.text: This is excellent!!! Just small enough to do the job, keeps small trash, like receipts, tissues, napkins off my car floor! Has a Velcro sticky for bottom of elastic band to hang! Love it! I'll need to get another for my other car! Thank you, and I also like the foldable feature!
customer_reviews.author: Chaun425

customer_reviews.title: Small but neat
customer_reviews.text: Helps keep the car need. A little smaller than I expected (you won't fit more than one can or bottle probably) but will be helpful for wrappers and other smaller garbage that take over your car! Mine didn't have any writing on side (which I prefer anyway)
customer_reviews.author: Melissa V.

customer_reviews.title: My great little car trash can
customer_reviews.text: My son has one of your traveling trash cans in his a car and I was so pleased to see it I immediately ask where he purchased it and of course it was from Amazon. As soon as I returned home I placed my order. I am very pleased with my traveling trash can.I had been searching for the ideal trash can for my car and now i Have it
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: You cannot return this item if it isn’t acceptable
customer_reviews.text: I had hoped this mini car trash can was bigger than the one I have. It isn’t. 😟 I had hoped to return it if it was the wrong size. Amazon says it is NOT returnable. 😱
customer_reviews.author: Brassfrog

customer_reviews.title: It’s nice but kinda bulky
customer_reviews.text: It’s nice but kinda bulky. I can’t find a place to hang it where it’s not in the way in the truck. I would rather have the flat kind then it wouldn’t stick out so much. The product is made well and nice tho.
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: Awesome scrapbooking trash bags!
customer_reviews.text: I bought these to try out for my scrapbooking tables. They are light enough to tape on the side of the tables for my customers to throw their scraps of paper in. Love them so I will be buying more to have at each station. Thank you. Ps, they would also be great for the car which is what they were intended for.
customer_reviews.author: Kay Todd

customer_reviews.title: It is a good product except for the size
customer_reviews.text: It is a good product except for the size. And my main issue with the size is how misleading it looks in the pictures. I'm pretty sure its photoshopped into the pictures for the product here and the proportions are definitely off...it is tiny. It is also not very heavy so it falls over a lot.
customer_reviews.author: mmh

customer_reviews.title: Tiny
customer_reviews.text: Product is well constructed. However had I known it’s dimensions I never would have bought it. It is way to small.
customer_reviews.author: Tessa Brown

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: Despite being small, this little trash can is perfect for my car. There's always straw wrappers, napkins, wadded up receipts, pop bottles, etc that find their way into the door pockets, on the floor or under the seats. This is perfect for all the small things that mess up my car!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Holds about 2 soda cans...
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice looking trash can and thought it might work out and not take up a lot of space. However this can't seem to hold more than two soda cans and a trip to McDonalds or other food on the go would overwhelm this trash can.
customer_reviews.author: Ken

customer_reviews.title: Nice product!
customer_reviews.text: I received this as a gift. Perfect for keeping my car trash free.
customer_reviews.author: pamcs

customer_reviews.title: Plenty big!
customer_reviews.text: Several reviewers commented that this bin was too little. I disagree. I think that it's plenty big for the car. I believe that at least 3 16 oz water bottles would fit in it. I plan to empty mine often, so this is more than enough space.
customer_reviews.author: S

customer_reviews.title: Cool Little Trash Can
customer_reviews.text: Great little trash can! I was surprised when i opened the package as it was smaller than expected, but that's ok, I got it at a fantastic price! It's a very nice, collapsible, cool can with a great design. Haven't used it yet but can't wait to put it to work!
customer_reviews.author: Sonicpeace

customer_reviews.title: Keepin it clean
customer_reviews.text: For this for my 16 year old cousin for her birthday to keep her new car clean :) smaller than I was imagining but pleasantly surprised at how well it holds up. I want one for myself now.
customer_reviews.author: ashlizrake

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: A little smaller than anticipated, however it is for the car so when you take that into consideration it fits great. Nice addition to help keep the car clean!;)
customer_reviews.author: Katie

customer_reviews.title: Small and good trash can for car
customer_reviews.text: This is a small trash can that can stays in your car. It goes over the headrest, but it is hard to put it on. The stretchy part is so small that it can break while putting it on. It is useful to have and I keep a plastic bag in it to be easily emptied.
customer_reviews.author: Leora

customer_reviews.title: Nice small garbage can for my vehicle!
customer_reviews.text: Very nice! Works perfect for garbage in my car. I will probably get one for my truck as well! East to empty and doesn't take up much room!
customer_reviews.author: cccmmmsss

product_meta.title: Zone Tech Universal Traveling Portable Car Trash Can - Black Collapsible Pop-up Leak Proof Trash Can
feature_bullets: ► LEAK PROOF - The Zone Tech trash can is leak proof. You don't have to worry about the coffee and food spills on your car interior. The Zone Tech trash cans can be used to dump your wrappers, tissues and unwanted trash but you can also spill your extra coffee, juice, water and the likes.

► PRACTICAL - The Zone Tech trash can is a must have for drivers & travelers alike. The Zone Tech trash bins are designed in a most practical way. The trash bins takes up minimal amount of space yet gives you full garbage capacity, without taking up all your legroom.
► CLEANLINESS - The Zone Tech trash can helps keep your car clean & tidy. The trash bins are handy and convenient when you need to throw rubbish on a trip.
► PREMIUM QUALITY - The Zone Tech trash can is well-made from premium quality materials to provide maximum strength, durability, and longevity.
► VERSATILITY - The Zone Tech trash bag is not only a trash bag but can also used as a storage bag for toys, clothes or whatever else you want to put inside.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.4 out of 5 stars1,013 ratings4.4 out of 5 stars
